column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm sure that I wouldn't have even noticed the crust if the sauce was aromatic and tasty... but it wasn't.  Somebody opened a can of tomato paste
column2: shook some "Jewel-Osco Italian Seasoning" over it
column3: and spread it out over the dough.  No style.  No pizzazz.  No nice Italian spice overtones.  Just.  Meh.  Do yourself a favor: buy a can of Contadina tomato paste
column4: shaker some pepper into it and pour it over a Saltine for a better taste experience.
